sentence.Network_cn: 她深情款款地凝视着他。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这呼唤也邀请我们竭尽心灵地 (soulfully) 活在每一个生活的范畴中。「游魂」不但是非基督徒生活状态，若我们不晓得回应神的呼唤， …

entry.tran: 感情深切的;情真意切的
entry.def: Something that is soulful expresses deep feelings, especially sadness or love.

example.tran: 他那双饱含深情的棕色大眼睛

auth_sentence.content: Roudette's soulfully androgenous voice soon emerges as their main draw.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Roudette's soulfully androgenous voice soon emerges as their main draw.

auth_sentence.content: Co-writer Jones, of course, is the star, and sings of her mother, soulfully conveying her emotion and strength.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Co-writer Jones, of course, is the star, and sings of her mother, soulfully conveying her emotion and strength.

auth_sentence.content: You never know, you too might fall in love with this beautiful marriage of bossa nova rhythms and soulfully delivered lyrics.
